Olle Ferm is Professor of Medieval History and Head of the Centre for Medieval Studies at Stockholm University. He has penned several books and articles on medieval culture including, most recently, Regards sur la France du Moyen Âge
and Regna firmat pietas

from the University of Virginia, and her Ph.D. from the University of Arizona. Her 2007 disseration was entitled “Los libros de acedrex dados e tablas: Historical, Artistic and Metaphysical Dimensions of Alfonso X’s Book of Games
